sentences.english: We go to Shabbat dinner every Friday.
sentences.chinese: 每个星期五，我们都去参加安息日晚宴。

sentences.english: Prof Wang Zihao, the president of BUCT hosted the welcome reception.
sentences.chinese: 王子镐校长出席了欢迎晚宴并祝酒。

sentences.english: Black-tie dinners and champagne parties were being held in the capitals of Europe.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲各国首都则举行了一连串正式庆祝晚宴。

sentences.english: The dinner took place at the Hotel Majestic, 19 Avenue Kléber, in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 晚宴在巴黎克莱贝尔大道19号的宏伟酒店内举行。

sentences.english: Then they buy the gelatinas in dinner-party-size lots until they are gone.
sentences.chinese: 然后在他们走之前买下一顿晚宴那么多的胶冻。

sentences.english: He wore blue jeans to a formal dinner.
sentences.chinese: 他穿着蓝色牛崽裤去参加一个正式的晚宴。

sentences.english: I'm afraid the unexpected accident may botch up the dinner today.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕这意想不到的事故会把今天的晚宴搞糟。

sentences.english: The dinner is ready. Please find your name card and take your seat.
sentences.chinese: 晚宴已准备好了，请大家找到自己的名签就座。

sentences.english: At last she chose a rosy dress to the party.
sentences.chinese: 她最后穿着一条玫瑰紫的长裙参加了晚宴。

sentences.english: She powdered her face before going to dinner.
sentences.chinese: 她去参加晚宴前往脸上搽了粉。

sentences.english: You meet a man called Lawrence at a dinner party.
sentences.chinese: 你在晚宴上遇到一个叫劳伦斯的人。

sentences.english: He flied non-stop from Beijing to Nanjing to attend an informal dinner party.
sentences.chinese: 他从北京直飞南京就是为了参加一个非正式的晚宴。

sentences.english: That invitation was to a dinner party hosted by one of Jordans royals.
sentences.chinese: 一封来自约旦皇室家族邀请参加晚宴的邀请信。

sentences.english: The evening dinner is so good, everyone enjoyed and aet overload to their stomach.
sentences.chinese: 在晚宴上，每个人都很好，让他们享受超负荷胃。

sentences.english: They sat near each other at a Scientology-sponsored dinner event before the race.
sentences.chinese: 在赛前山达基赞助的晚宴上，他们坐得很近。

sentences.english: One night we went to dinner at Jay and Moura’s.
sentences.chinese: 有天晚上我们去杰伊和莫拉家里参加晚宴。

definition: to entertain (for dinner)/to invite to dinner
